author: Cassa Niedringhaus
title: Holocaust survivor: 'I lost my will to live'

REMEMBERING THE HOLOCAUST 93-year-old Holocaust survivor tells story to thousands before dying | 1:00 Jack Marcus volunteered at schools and colleges to tell his Holocaust story to thousands of students. The 93-year-old survivor died Tuesday. Wochit

REMEMBERING THE HOLOCAUST Voices of holocaust survivors fading, 70 years on | 2:25 Holocaust survivor Albert Garih has recounted his difficult experience during World War II countless times. But as the 76-year-old ages, he acknowledges he doesn't have much longer to share his powerful story. Video provided by AFP AFP

REMEMBERING THE HOLOCAUST Holocaust survivor Elie Buzyn speaks after 50 years of silence | 2:48 Auschwitz survivor Elie Buzyn saw his brother killed in front of him and his parents led away to the gas chambers. Too traumatised to speak of his experiences for 50 years, he now believes it's his duty to share his story. Duration: 02:48 Video prov Newslook

REMEMBERING THE HOLOCAUST Holocaust survivor to receive high school diploma | 1:57 Henry Friedman, an 86-year-old Holocaust survivor who never had the chance to get his high school diploma, will soon have one courtesy of a Seattle-area school district. VPC

REMEMBERING THE HOLOCAUST Raw: Pope Francis visits Auschwitz-Birkenau | 1:43 Pope Francis paid a somber visit to the Nazi German death camp of Auschwitz-Birkenau, becoming the third consecutive pontiff to make the pilgrimage to the place where more than 1 million people were killed, most of them Jews. (July 29) AP

Starr endured several Nazi concentration camps, including Auschwitz. (Photo: Valerie Mosley/The Coloradoan)
